mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (title, promotion, project_type, progress, deadline, create_at, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{promotion}, #{projectType}, #{progress}, #{deadline}, NOW(), #{userId})
INSERT INTO savings_project (project_id, period_days, interest_rate, success_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{periodDays}, #{interestRate}, #{successCondition})
INSERT INTO loan_project (project_id, loan_limit, desired_interest_rate, reward, reward_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{loanLimit}, #{desiredInterestRate}, #{reward}, #{rewardCondition})
INSERT INTO donation_project (project_id, recipient, usage_plan, target_amount) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{recipient}, #{usagePlan}, #{targetAmount})
INSERT INTO challenge_project (project_id, challenge_period_days, reward, reward_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{challengePeriodDays}, #{reward}, #{rewardCondition})
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.title, p.promotion, p.project_type, p.progress, p.create_at, COUNT(v.vote_id) AS vote_count FROM project p LEFT JOIN votes v ON p.project_id = v.project_id GROUP BY p.project_id ORDER BY vote_count DESC, p.create_at DESC
SELECT project_type AS type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project GROUP BY project_type

SELECT DISTINCT p.project_id, p.title, p.promotion, p.project_type, p.progress, p.create_at, p.deadline, p.user_id FROM project p JOIN project_keywords pk ON p.project_id = pk.project_id JOIN user_keywords uk ON pk.keyword_id = uk.keyword_id WHERE uk.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.create_at DESC

SELECT project_type, CASE WHEN create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND create_at < CURDATE() THEN 'Week1' WHEN create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND create_at < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN 'Week2' WHEN create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 21 DAY) AND create_at < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) THEN 'Week3' WHEN create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 28 DAY) AND create_at < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 21 DAY) THEN 'Week4' WHEN create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 35 DAY) AND create_at < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 28 DAY) THEN 'Week5' END AS week_group, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project WHERE create_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 35 DAY) GROUP BY week_group, project_type ORDER BY week_group ASC
